// Available wallpaper categories (based on actual available images)
export const WALLPAPER_CATEGORIES=[{name:'rajini',displayName:'Rajini',imageCount:8,enabled:true},{name:'kamal',displayName:'Kamal',imageCount:3,enabled:true},{name:'common_mass',displayName:'Common Mass',imageCount:11,enabled:true},{name:'automobile',displayName:'Automobile',imageCount:23,enabled:true},{name:'motivational',displayName:'Motivational',imageCount:18,enabled:true},{name:'nature',displayName:'Nature',imageCount:2,enabled:true},{name:'spiritual',displayName:'Spiritual',imageCount:4,enabled:true},{name:'random',displayName:'Random',imageCount:2,enabled:true},{name:'anime',displayName:'Anime',imageCount:10,enabled:true},{name:'bikes',displayName:'Bikes',imageCount:0,enabled:true},{name:'ai',displayName:'AI',imageCount:0,enabled:true},{name:'tech',displayName:'Tech',imageCount:0,enabled:true}];// Available rotation intervals (in milliseconds)
export const ROTATION_INTERVALS=[{value:30000,label:'30 seconds'},{value:60000,label:'1 minute'},{value:300000,label:'5 minutes'},{value:600000,label:'10 minutes'}];// Available font colors
export const FONT_COLORS=[{name:'White',value:'#ffffff'},{name:'Light Blue',value:'#87ceeb'},{name:'Light Green',value:'#90ee90'},{name:'Light Yellow',value:'#ffffe0'},{name:'Light Pink',value:'#ffb6c1'},{name:'Light Orange',value:'#ffd700'},{name:'Light Purple',value:'#dda0dd'},{name:'Light Gray',value:'#d3d3d3'}];// Available font families
export const FONT_FAMILIES=[{name:'Arial',value:'Arial, sans-serif'},{name:'Helvetica',value:'Helvetica, sans-serif'},{name:'Times New Roman',value:'Times New Roman, serif'},{name:'Georgia',value:'Georgia, serif'},{name:'Courier New',value:'Courier New, monospace'}];// Default application settings
export const DEFAULT_SETTINGS={clockEnabled:true,wallpaperEnabled:true,selectedCategories:['rajini','kamal','automobile'],// Start with categories that have images
rotationInterval:60000,// 1 minute default
wallpaperSize:'normal',timeFormat:'12h',fontColor:'#ffffff',fontFamily:'Arial, sans-serif'};// Application configuration
export const APP_CONFIG={categories:WALLPAPER_CATEGORIES,defaultSettings:DEFAULT_SETTINGS,rotationIntervals:ROTATION_INTERVALS.map(interval=>interval.value)};// Local storage keys
export const STORAGE_KEYS={SETTINGS:'desktop-clock-settings',VERSION:'1.0.0'};// Mouse activity settings
export const MOUSE_ACTIVITY={HIDE_DELAY:3000,// Hide settings after 3 seconds of inactivity
DEBOUNCE_DELAY:100// Debounce mouse movement events
};// Wallpaper scaling values
export const WALLPAPER_SCALES={normal:1.0,enlarged:1.3};// Time update interval
export const TIME_UPDATE_INTERVAL=1000;// Update every second
// IST timezone
export const IST_TIMEZONE='Asia/Kolkata';// CSS class names
export const CSS_CLASSES={WALLPAPER_CONTAINER:'wallpaper-container',WALLPAPER_IMAGE:'wallpaper-image',CLOCK_CONTAINER:'clock-container',CLOCK_FULLSCREEN:'clock-fullscreen',CLOCK_BOTTOM_LEFT:'clock-bottom-left',SETTINGS_PANEL:'settings-panel',SETTINGS_VISIBLE:'settings-visible',SETTINGS_HIDDEN:'settings-hidden'};
